strings:
<voice_0x01000DE1><se_def>Ishmahri: Aah...?
Welcome once more to the Land of the Moonshadow, fortunate travellers.
<voice_0x01000DE2><se_def>Ishmahri: The Moonshadow window opens but once in a human's lifetime to grant a single wish.
<voice_0x01000DE3><se_def>Ishmahri: It is mysterious indeed that we should meet for a second time.
<voice_0x01000DE4><se_def>Ishmahri: Enlighten me, what wish has brought you back to me upon this night?
<Cap><leader> tells Ishmahri about the ship in the wasteland.
<voice_0x01000DE5><se_def>Ishmahri: I know the ship of which you speak. Long ago, it would travel the vast oceans, guided by the light of the moon. I remember it well.
<voice_0x01000DE6><se_def>Ishmahri: And now you wish to return this ship to the ocean from whence it came? A simple task.
<voice_0x01000DE7><se_def>Ishmahri: All we must do is revive the memory of ancient times. Those times when there was once an ocean where now there is only land.

<voice_0x01000DE8><se_def>Ishmahri: You saw for yourselves in Ascantha...
Now I will again give form to a memory,
the memory of the ocean that sleeps in the land.
<voice_0x01000DE9><se_def>Ishmahri: Yes, yes, the music will rouse the memory...

<voice_0x01000DEA><se_def>Ishmahri: Ah... It is as I feared.
This harp is not powerful enough.
<voice_0x01000DEB><se_def>Ishmahri: I will need a greater instrument if I am to perform such a task.

<voice_0x01000DED><se_def>Ishmahri: Yes, it is coming to me...
There is an aura that surrounds you...
It is faint, but I can feel it.
<voice_0x01000DEE><se_def>Ishmahri: I see it! A Moonshadow harp in the world of the sun's light. With that, no undertaking would be beyond the realms of possibility.
<voice_0x01000DEF><se_def>Ishmahri: Lend me your ears. Somewhere in your world there is an almighty instrument.
<voice_0x01000DF0><se_def>Ishmahri: Somewhere along the path you have already trodden. A friend will guide you to it.

<voice_0x01000DF1><se_def>Ishmahri: My brave children.
If you wish to awaken the ancient ship,
you must first find the Moonshadow harp.
<voice_0x01000DF2><se_def>Ishmahri: Bring it to me and I shall summon the memory of that ancient ocean, and the ship shall sail once more.
